name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly
id: stories/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly

testSteps.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page

And change all possible fields on the Event Discovery Widget page:
［|apiKey |keyWord|postalCodeApi|city|attractionId|venueId|promoterId|source      |countryCode|classificationName|eventCount|
|apikeys|adele  |90015        |York|333444      |222111 |9999      |ticketmaster|Canada     |movies            |50        |］

children.description: Change values for all fields: apikeys, adele, 90015, York, 333444, 222111, 9999, ticketmaster, Canada, movies, 50

testSteps.description: And store all fields values on the Event Discovery Widget page
Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened

children.description: Check that popup embedded code is opened

testSteps.description: And embedded html code contains stored values on the Event Discovery Widget page

children.description: Check that embedded html code contains stored values

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly
